name: Satorista
description:
A tiny VN for Touhou Fan Game Jam 6 about the making of coffee and how everything will be fine. There's an (easy-to-find) "hidden" customer ... but no sound, so put on your favorite chill Touhou beats to study/relax to.

Collab with my brother, who has basically no internet presence but did the programming and some writing.

It was kind of a proof of concept to see if we could learn Renpy and slam something out in 3 days, so don't expect literature, but it felt good to pull it off!
